com.aevi.print.model

Class TextRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.print.model.TextRow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Jsonable, PrintRow, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class TextRow
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrintRow, java.lang.Cloneable
    This class represents a single text line in a PrintPayload.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextRow(java.lang.String text)
      Creates a left aligned text row with with no styling.
      TextRow(java.lang.String text, PrinterFont printerFont)
      Creates a left aligned text row using the font given by the fontId.

      Gets the Alignment style of this text row.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextRow

        public TextRow(java.lang.String text)
        Creates a left aligned text row with with no styling.
        Parameters:
        text - The row text. This parameter must not be null.

      • TextRow

        public TextRow(java.lang.String text,
               PrinterFont printerFont)
        Creates a left aligned text row using the font given by the fontId. The font must match a PrinterFont as provided by the printer via its settings methods. See PrinterSettings.getPrinterFonts().
        Parameters:
        text - The text to add
        printerFont - The printer font to use
